p: After recording the impedance spectra, the same full cells that underwent 10 000 cycles at 3 mA cm −2, have been further cycled at low currents (see Figure 7). Upon 50 cycles at 0.5 mA cm −2 ZFO-deLi/LFP-CNT, ZFO-200/LFP-CNT, and ZFO-600/LFP-CNT showed stable capacities of 63, 62, and 68 mAh g −1 TOT. In regard to the values obtained at the same current before the stability tests (see Figure 3b), these numbers results in remarkable capacity retentions of 73%, 72%, and 76% for ZFO-deLi/LFP-CNT, ZFO-200/LFP-CNT, and ZFO-600/LFP-CNT, respectively.
